borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a rear extension at second floor level over part of the existing back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension to the side of the back addition; excavation of the front and rear garden to form lightwells in connection with the enlargement of the existing basement, further excavation underneath the front garden to form an enclosed air conditioning unit; erection of a new dormer window to replace the existing window in the rear roofslope; relocation of a bin store in front garden at ground floor level; installation of 1no rooflight above the main flat roof at roof level; erection of external staircases from basement to ground floor level at the front and rear of the property; replacement of existing timber framed windows with new double glazed timber framed windows to the side and rear elevation at first floor level; installation of new door and window to replace the existing door to the rear elevation of ground floor back addition.
